task.summary: Default task
started integrating variable widgets into dynamic layout widgets
stopped working on variable widget. looking to do something simpler.
switched over to data driven architecture for all variables. also, dynamic widgets can now be either inputs or outputs
started integrating json code into new architecture.
finished and debugged new variables architecture.
finished autovars. might still need a little debug.
fully debugged new architecture and autovars. still need to debug on RPI.
debugged new architecture on RPI.
created separate clocks for variables and arduino. makes program much quicker.
removed KivyMD. was really clunky on RPI. using kivy garden navigation drawer. so far, so good.
-Added 'invert' option for screen widgets.
-added compound variables to autovars. -added 'logged-in' and 'passcode prompt' SYS variables. -added 'invert' widget, only for inputs. -changed autovars to be event driven.
-started working on new variables.json structure
-started working on new variables.json structure
- finished alias debug. - added pos and size based dyn_widgets. - still debugging "save" of dyanamic_layout.json
- created myscatter for testing scaling buttons.
- finished scatter widget proof of concept.
- integrated scatter widgets into main application, and debugged.
- working out a few variable bugs related to alias addition
- trying to work out major bug with "on_data_change" and widget references
- started major changes to get away from "clear_widgets" architecture
- finished architecture change to keep track of all widgets and not use the mass "clear_widgets". - able to add and delete widgets - start scheme in edit popup to allow for new types of widgets.
- finished adding and debugging 'label' widget
- finished initial 'scripts' implementation. need to add ability to insert aliases.
- debugged latest release (aliases, moveable widgets, add/delete widgets, new settings screen)
- starting making screen look more modern. - removed "enable" checkbox on widget popup.
- fixed bug in label widget.
- fixed issue where widgets were getting saved with the wrong position
- made wigdet edges easier to see in modify mode.
- added developer settings tab for 'close app', 'reboot', and 'shutdown'. - re-wrote code to keep searching for arduino if disconnected.
- added config set for double_tap_distance
- Switched backup camera to cv2 code. This is due to constant driver issue in Kivy, and to gain access to more features.
- Forgot to add kivy_cv.py to git last time. - Removed win, pc, debug variables. - Cleaned up project files.
- Added CAN engine, and 8 row digital inputs.
- Added CAN engine, and 8 row digital inputs.
- Finished flame detect and CAN debug.
- Added admin login.
- Show/hide variables based on accessories selected. - Started working on selectable dynamic layout.
- Selectable dynamic layout done. - Added ability to communicate with two more Flame Detect modules. - Created a 24ch flame detect layout.
- Changed SYS_TIME to seconds, instead of elapsed time. - Label can now format SYS_TIME into a time/date stamp.
- Changed ignition input GPIO to 27. - Added GPIO.cleanup() to shutdown, reboot, and exit to make sure output to power supply micro always shuts off.
- Added popup to adjust date/time.
- Added flame alarm.
- Fixed some bugs with the time/date popup.
- Buttons now use a canvas for future flexibility. - Button colors can now be changed. - Screen item edit mode is now a little more obvious and easier to exit from.
- Minor button modifications.
- Fixed issue with flame alarm. - Trying out new theme with white background.
- Switched from serial to CAN for dio module. Still needs debug.
- Change RPi state output to a heartbeat. - Fixed some widget color issues. - New CAN should be fully debugged.

MESSAGE.value: - finished initial 'scripts' implementation. need to add ability to insert aliases.
- debugged latest release (aliases, moveable widgets, add/delete widgets, new settings screen)
- starting making screen look more modern. - removed "enable" checkbox on widget popup.
- fixed bug in label widget.
- fixed issue where widgets were getting saved with the wrong position
- made wigdet edges easier to see in modify mode.
- added developer settings tab for 'close app', 'reboot', and 'shutdown'. - re-wrote code to keep searching for arduino if disconnected.
- added config set for double_tap_distance
- Switched backup camera to cv2 code. This is due to constant driver issue in Kivy, and to gain access to more features.
- Forgot to add kivy_cv.py to git last time. - Removed win, pc, debug variables. - Cleaned up project files.
- Added CAN engine, and 8 row digital inputs.
- Finished flame detect and CAN debug.
- Added admin login.
- Show/hide variables based on accessories selected. - Started working on selectable dynamic layout.
- Selectable dynamic layout done. - Added ability to communicate with two more Flame Detect modules. - Created a 24ch flame detect layout.
- Changed SYS_TIME to seconds, instead of elapsed time. - Label can now format SYS_TIME into a time/date stamp.
- Changed ignition input GPIO to 27. - Added GPIO.cleanup() to shutdown, reboot, and exit to make sure output to power supply micro always shuts off.
- Added popup to adjust date/time.
- Added flame alarm.
- Fixed some bugs with the time/date popup.
- Buttons now use a canvas for future flexibility. - Button colors can now be changed. - Screen item edit mode is now a little more obvious and easier to exit from.
- Minor button modifications.
- Fixed issue with flame alarm. - Trying out new theme with white background.
- Switched from serial to CAN for dio module. Still needs debug.
- Change RPi state output to a heartbeat. - Fixed some widget color issues. - New CAN should be fully debugged.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - Change RPi state output to a heartbeat. - Fixed some widget color issues. - New CAN should be fully debugged.
